verbs.description: Trump [V: must] act to curb Washington ’s appetite for involvement everywhere — regardless of its connection to U.S. security — and focus American military power with greater precision .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: act] [ARG1: to curb Washington ’s appetite for involvement everywhere — regardless of its connection to U.S. security — and focus American military power with greater precision] .

[ARG0: Trump] must act to [V: curb] [ARG1: Washington ’s appetite for involvement] [ARGM-LOC: everywhere] — [ARGM-ADV: regardless of its connection to U.S. security] — and focus American military power with greater precision .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: must] act to curb Washington ’s appetite for involvement everywhere — regardless of its connection to U.S. security — and [V: focus] [ARG1: American military power] [ARGM-MNR: with greater precision] .
